# [FEAT] App Marketplace

## Labels
`api`, `customization`, `priority:low`

## Description
Implement an app marketplace for extending DevDesk functionality with third-party integrations.

## Requirements

### App Framework
- App manifest format
- App locations (ticket sidebar, navbar, etc.)
- App APIs
- Secure data access
- App settings storage

### Marketplace Features
- Browse apps
- App categories
- Search apps
- App ratings/reviews
- Featured apps
- App screenshots

### App Installation
- One-click install
- Configuration wizard
- Permission grants
- Account-level install
- Role-based access

### App Types
- Sidebar apps
- Background apps
- Modal apps
- Full-page apps
- Channel integrations

### Developer Tools
- App development SDK
- Local testing tools
- App submission process
- App review/approval
- Developer documentation

### App Management
- Installed apps list
- App settings
- Enable/disable apps
- Uninstall apps
- App updates

## Zendesk Reference
Zendesk Marketplace provides a wide range of third-party apps and integrations to extend platform functionality.

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] App framework works
- [ ] Marketplace browsable
- [ ] App installation functional
- [ ] Multiple app types supported
- [ ] Developer tools available
